attributes.action: Bring all private hospitals into emergency private ownership
attributes.additional_details: This could massively increase the amount of beds available during the current pandemic including ICU capacity.
attributes.background: Let the NHS run all private hospitals so more cases can be dealt with at once.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/302610

You can find out more about coronavirus and how you can protect yourself and others here:

NHS website: https://www.nhs.uk/conditions/coronavirus-covid-19/

UK Government website: https://www.gov.uk/guidance/coronavirus-covid-19-information-for-the-public
